column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: I love pinterest, but lately the app has been acting strange. I will close it, go to a different app for a couple minutes, and come back. A lot of the time it will say that it cannot find my user and absolutely nothing will load. I have a good wifi connection and I have a new phone. Besides all that, there is just as many ads as there is pins. I can tolerate the ads since the don't really get in the way unless I accidentally tap on it

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
column3: Pinterest is a fantastic app that has exceeded my expectations. The user interface is intuitive and easy to navigate, making it simple to find inspiration for my latest projects. The app is also incredibly fast, with images loading quickly and smoothly. One of the best features of Pinterest is the ability to create boards, which allows me to organize my ideas and keep track of my favorite pins. I also appreciate the personalized recommendations that the app provides based on my interests.

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: GREAT idea BUT I feel it is outdated. I have not seen much difference in the app in recent years. Best way I can describe is it is bulky and slow (almost dialup slow, lol). A great tool for collecting, finding new ideas for anything you may be interested in learning, and storing them in one location. Would like to see an overhaul... Making it more streamlined, faster loading time, and a more modern look.

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
column3: pinterest is great, you can find anything and everything on this app. i use it all the time. my one complaint is that i cant listen to music whilst on the app, since the ads have sound even if i dont click on them. it is kinda annoying, as it just stops my music for no reason even if an ad isnt on screen. if you could do something about this i would be so grateful

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column3: It's eady and fun to use, making for a good time killer or when I want to find a drawing tutorial or fanart. That is, when it lets you use it. For the past several months, the app will freeze and crash if you open a post. The only way I could fix this was by holding down 3 different posts before opening a post. But then that failed to work, and then I just uninstalled it and then installed it again. Please fix this so I don't have to waste 3 minutes just to use your app.

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: The latest update drove the performance of this app down. I can't have my music playing at the same time I open Pinterest anymore because then my music will pause every time I click on a picture. I can't tap on links or the app might crash. I can't even save a pic to my phone, because then the app just freezes. The format is less visually pleasing than it was before the update, and all in all - it just doesn't work.

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column3: Good for finding images and inspiration. I just have a problem with the high infestation of suggestive imagery that doesn't get filtered, so it's just too awkward to use. But it's good other than that. there aren't ads that are just in your face they're more displayed, like the images that I don't have a problem with. It isn't too hard to find something you're looking for most of the time unless the topic is over specific or really obscure. 8/10.

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: Everyone can visit: ( BrowserGood. Com ) to install the best browser app. It's BLOCK ADS, PRIVACY and VERY FAST. I love the Pinterest app, but since the last update it's been kind of weird. Those of you who have it know that when you scroll through videos, they play without the audio to try and get you to click on them. That's fine with me but then, if I choose not to click it, the next time I click a pin -- video or not -- it plays the music from the video I had last passed and not clicked

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: I wish I could rate this higher but there's a problem that I'm sure many have been experiencing based on the reviews I've seen. The videos keep on loading and getting cut off, every video I click, it keeps on loading. I can't watch videos properly, despite my good internet connection, it's been happening a whole while now and it's starting to frustrate me. Good app, but overall bad performance. Re-installs/updates have been done, still, the issue is not yet fixed.

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: One of my favorite apps that I've had almost 8 years. I understand the need to keep up with competition but the videos are an annoyance because they always sends you to a web link or play more videos when I just want to see the image or similar images. Same with some pictures as well. That's really my only issue with the app.

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: I like Pinterest as a way of finding ideas and categorizing various inspirations, from horror to space aesthetics. I don't mind that my home page/explore page thing is full of this hodge podge of aesthetics, but lately there's been some algorithm change where my search results are a muddied mess. I can look up "hand drawing tutorial" and get aesthetic pictures of moths and galaxies that I recently saved. VERY ANNOYING! I want to be able to quickly switch btwn my aesthetics when I'm searching.

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: Every once in awhile, I open up pinterest and remember why it's my least used app. There's so much spam/ads in the pins it's hardly usable. It gets worse with each update. Videos are a cool idea but you can't rewind on many. They've added a feature where it'll play once then an option to follow pops up that won't disappear. I guess you have to follow to replay it but since I refused I have no idea. The only thing that keeps me from deleting is the hope it'll morph back into something useful.

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: Every once in awhile, I open up pinterest and remember why it's my least used app. There's so much spam/ads in the pins it's hardly usable. It gets worse with each update. Videos are a cool idea but you can't rewind on many. They've added a feature where it'll play once then an option to follow pops up that won't disappear. I guess you have to follow to replay it but since I refused I have no idea. The only thing that keeps me from deleting is the hope it'll morph back into something useful.

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: I used to really love this app. I would rate it to even 10 stars. But lately, when I tried to save images to gallery, it says "image saved" and when I open up my gallery, there is no image saved. It won't appear. Then I open up my DCIM file, there is a question mark other than the old saved images. I really hope this will get fixed as fast as possible. It is so disappointing.

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column3: Love it... when it works, that is. Closes or freezes frequently. Newest update on 1/24/20 has resulted in less freezing and closing, but when you hit "Save" it takes forever. I also don't like the new way notifications are displayed, nor do I like the failure to identify the specific board to which I've previously saved a Pin in the instance of a double pin.

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column3: Great, other than the ads. Some things are so riddled with ads that you can't even view what you're looking at. I'd actually pay for ad ad-free experience in this app (I would NOT for most apps, as I'm not generally into using real money in the virtual world). I find a ton of great DIY ideas, life hacks, tutorials, recipes and more... And I can keep it all well organized so I can actually find it later. If it wasnt so helpful, I'd drop it due to all the ads. But it's worth the annoyance.

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: I love Pinterest, it's an amazing tool for creatives, but it's not the same as it used to be. At some point in time they changed the algorithm, and now it's MUCH more of an echo chamber. When you pin something, they immediately fill your feed with other closely related pins, even if you've shown no other interest in the thing. It's incredibly frustrating for creatives, as you just get shown the same pins over and over. Myself and others have had to move to Instagram for better variety.

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: Over the years, this app has gotten busier and busier. A quiet perusal it at night is impossible, as there seems to be no way to turn off the video / sound option ( outside of turning down the volume of my phone ). I can appreciate the algorithms attempts to show me relevant options, but the constant advertisements are making harder to enjoy.

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: Pretty good for finding aesthetics and making mood boards and the like, but there are WAY too many ads now. When I search up something, more than half of the results are ads instead of just pictures. If I wanted to go shopping, I'd use a shopping app. This is supposed to be an inspiration app. It's really annoying to have to click out of websites over and over because I'm constantly accidentally clicking ads. Tone it down!

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: Was great until they put a "feature" in where when you enlarge a picture, 1/3 of it gets covered over with a Visual Search dialog at the bottom. I hate that stupid "feature". I'm almost ready to u install it, now. UPDATE: This spy gets more annoying as time goes by! Now it clicks every time I touch the screen for anything! Minus one üåü!

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column3: I love being able to keep everything easily accessible and grouped in categories, awesome app for the most part. But some of the links are so bound by ads that just take over to the point of not being able to view what you searched for. It is not worth the time spent trying to find what you are looking for. The ads actually take over and there is no way out but to click the ad or close the app. I understand that this is not in the control of Pinterest, but it would be nice if there were a way to avoid ad controlled links.

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: The new update is so frustrating! It automatically saves pins to whatever board it thinks it fits in, and it's so annoying having to change it. There used to be the option to pick which board it goes in, and even which specific section. Now I don't have that option and it's super time consuming to have to go back and sort through every pin. Please put it back to the way it was, or at least give us the option to turn this feature off.

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: Hey i love pinterest but i wish we could go back to having two columns instead of 3, because i think the appeal of the platform is the easiness to saving content onto boards, sometimes without the need to click and enlarge it. Having 3 columns takes that away because the photos are now too small, so users have to click to see what it's all about. It takes away from the user experience. Please bring back the old view, or make it an option for users to choose for themselves.

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: I would've given this app 5 stars in a heartbeat, but one major drawback is the reason I couldn't. Just like the majority of users, I too can't download pictures. I have to go all the way to the file explorer and rename the unsaved pictures as .jpg in order to make them appear in my gallery. Although there's a way to deal with this issue, I'd still like you guys to fix this problem because it's really annoying and the process is very long as well, especially when my phone hangs every second.

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column3: I really like this app. Great way to keep track of just about everything from cooking recipes to diy projects, hobbys, fashion, leisure activity's etc. Endless possibilities. I just feel the homepage can be a bit busy trying to show all your interests simultaneously. Would be nice to somehow tweak the UI to be less cluttered, at least on a mobile device.

I wish the company would change this policy, as they have a solid product already that many people love. Fast-paced badly implemented 'improvements' are only hurting their credibility and retention rate.

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars

Especially as sometimes the music continues to play after minimising the app.

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column3: I gave 4 stars because there's one issue with this app. Pinterest tends to cause issues for any music application that plays music. Whenever I click on an image in the app it constantly stops or closes any music app I have playing. At first I thought that the music application I was using was the problem until I dealt with the same issue with multiple music apps.

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: A fantastic unmatched app. However, many glitches. Often freezes and I can't access my boards. To fix this I close the app entirely and reopen. Today the entire navigation bar has disappeared and is completely unaccessible. I'm also not a fan of the new automatic music on videos. Seemingly more glitches as time goes on which is concerning.

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars

I love just browsing as well and looking at all the cute things people have made and created. The only thing that Pintrest doesn't do or have, is the option to add a picture of what you tried when you find something similar. And the option to use a photo to look it up no longer is available. That was such a handy option to have.

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: Pinterest is great but the app has its flaws. Biggest issue ive got so far is that the top of the screen has this vignette over it. So you cant even see like 20% of the images. Which is frankly a major design flaw for an app all about images. Also, the "All Pins" board is a little annoying. I have no use for it but its a permanent feature. It would be nice if we could delete it or at least hide it from view.

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: I love Pinterest and use it daily, but recently there's been what I assume to be a bug that is becoming increasingly annoying. Essentially, when I click on a post from the search results page or my recommendation page, when I scroll down instead of getting similar things recommended it's all just Etsy and redbubble ads I've never shown interest to before. Another issue is algorithm- my recommendations when i open the app used to be so diverse, it was great. Now? Whatever i last pinned x100

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: I love Pinterest but Not on my phone. For the first few years of Pinterest I encouraged everyone I talked with to try it. Lately, however, I am so frustrated by it as now I mostly use the app on my phone. But when you click a pin to go to it, it is almost totally covered with video ads and only a couple of lines for the actual page is visible. Trying to follow a recipe? Forget it! On the computer Pinterest is great. But who carries an actual computer around with them?

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: I was fed up with the autoplaying video ads, so I followed the instructions to disable them. It worked for a short while, but now once again, every single video ad autoplays. My settings have not changed. And the video ads are EVERYWHERE, so numerous that I will quite often have more than one playing on my screen simultaneously. Again, I have set my Pinterest app to disable autoplay, but the video ads autoplay anyway -- and there is an obscenely high number of them.

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column3: It's a good app but no options to customize the behavior like if I want to turn off videos and only want to see pictures, can't do that. if I want change behavior of gestures inside the app, can't do that. Then sometimes it glitches and throws you out of the swiping back to the overall view and instead of puking you out at the point you left it throws you to the very start so you gotta scroll all the way down again that's not very thought out.

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: The app crashed so I thought it was due to the update. Tried to update it and it couldn't complete that. Uninstalled it and tried to install it back to see if it would work but its stuck at 68% and won't progress. Honestly it worked better before the updates. Classic example of fixing something that wasn't broken and managing to completely ruin it. Hoping they can fix whatever problem it has now because it's an amaizing app for inspiration and I love it (but the bugs make it terrible) fix it!

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: Too easy to accidentally hit a button that subscribes to monthly charges. Can't find a way to disable that subscription. Music was good but not at price like that and when I can easily go to youtube to get the music free. very disappointed because I can't unsubscribe, simply because my thumb hit the wrong button when I searched for a song. BE CAREFUL WHEN LOOKING FOR A NEW SONG/STARTING A PLAYLIST. VERY SLICK WAY OF HAVING YOU SUBSCRIBE AND NO WAY TO UNSUBSCRIBE.

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column3: Pinterest is a cool app. You can archive your favorite visual media while sharing your ideas. it's an entertaining way to view your favorite subjects. The user interface is pretty well constructed, but I wish it was better about remembering where you left off when scouting someone's long thread. It's a very good app overall:^{)>

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: I really adore Pinterest; it's been a part of my daily routine as an artist and a person who enjoys the aesthetics. However, Pinterest has been undergoing a huge downgrade throughout fhe past few years, with the amount of ads that are being shown multiplying (it's almost ridiculous, really) and one of the most important features to me, as an artist, disappearing: the "i tried this pin" way of posting a drawing to a reference, to connect with and get inspired by other artists. Bring it back!!

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: I used to really enjoy this app, but now it's just a bunch of adds. They also got rid of the Tried This feature, where you could show what you created from a pin idea; food, art project, photography skill, ect. That was my favorite part, seeing what other people created with the pin idea, and seeing a more realistic outcome of food recipes. Now it's no longer a creative app but just a browsing app.

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: Pinterest is one of if not my favorite social media app. BUT the last few updates have been so buggy. Also videos wont play and just show a black screen until you exit and click back around 12 times. Needs to be fixed. Asap. **2 months since initial review and the video blackout issue is still as unbearble as ever. Its been like this much longer than 2 months. Either fix the bug or ditch the videos on your platform all together. Huge waste of time and energy to atempt to watch a 30 second video

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: I enjoy this app as a portable version of the browser version. Currently its a little glitchy and unstable. As some mentioned in other reviews, when tapping on pins unknown audio plays. There's nothing in the settings to turn it off and I resulted to muting my phone when using the app. Something else I noticed is the dark mode option appears and disappears for no reason. It will sometimes open with its default white background. The option to change it is then gone. Please fix these odd issues.

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: The "smart" feed is dumber than a 5th grader. It's low quality and relevance. Reguardless, I simply want my following only feed back - I follow carefully, selectively, for good reason, and it never did me wrong (at least it'd be within my control and responsibility if it had). I understand promotional pins. Maybe a minority of suggestions, or an option to turn on/off. This however is unnecessary and unsalvageable. You've destroyed usability and user experience. Listen to us. Do better.

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: This new update has some issues! I cannot see the messages and my account bar once I scroll down. And another thing is that when we keep pressing a pin to save or share, the buttons become too much sensitive to use. I face issues when i save a pin etc. It shares when i wanted to save and vice versa. Plz fix this. its too annoying! I hope i explained enough.

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: I used to be able to scroll on forever. I liked the abyss. Now, theres maybe a set of 10 pins and you reach the end. I hit the back button and it takes me back to the surface for air and usually refreshes with a new set of 10 pins, so at least theres that, but it's annoying to keep jumping to the top. Give me back the abyss, Pinterest!!!!

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: I used to spend so much time on this app. Hundreds of hours planning my home, crafts, recipes, etc. But, just like everything, ads slowly crept in and eventually became so overwhelming and obnoxious the app is almost not fit for purpose anymore. I only keep it because sometimes it's worth slogging through the ads to find what I need, but usually not. 2/5 stars for the 2/5 genuine pins left in search.

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: Like many others, I actually do really love pinterest. However, with the most recent updates I find myself becoming so frustrated that I barely use the app or website. I can learn to live with the most of the things you've changed/got rid of, but the last straw is that you've stopped telling me if I've already saved a pin and to which board. Now I have to go through boards with 4k+ pins on the desktop to try to identify the double saves. If I have to check every pin every time, whats the point?

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: Honestly? This app is a total headache. Content is ok. Every second post is an add. Sometimes one add is multiple adds. Sometimes there is a random video starting immedeatly and you cant turn it off. Same with music. Just random music playing. SO ANNOYING. I cant even listen to music while using because every minute there is some dumb song starting and I need to turn my music back on. Pinterest is THE most annoying app in the world.

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column3: I've been using Pinterest since you needed an invitation, and the app since 2015. In all its iterations, it's been one of the most-used and most useful apps on my phone. Sure, there's been some issues along the way, but I don't see it leaving my phone anytime soon. The visual aspect is fantastic- super great for creative pursuits of all sorts. And it's almost completely replaced my cookbooks. It's helping me decorate and care for my first house now :)

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: Love the site but this app needs work desperately! One stop having adds interupt my music, I'm tired of having to exit out of the app just to restart my music. Two stop showing the notification when you pin something, it takes up the hole upper screen and you can't press the back button. Three just give it a simple clean layout that focuses on the image, I'm tired of the constant changing to horrible layouts that clutter everything.

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: Ughhhh!!! With every update pinterest is getting worse and worse! Now I can't even change the cover image for a board and it randomly selects on from the images I saved on that board! Now you also can't even move pins around on your board! Just stop trying to make pinterest more "aEsThEtiC" and focus on functionality!! I just want it to be easy to use and edit like it was before. Dont keep changing the layout every 2 minutes and just keep things the way everyone likes them!!!

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: Listen. We all LOVE Pinterest for ideas. I am personally disappointed by the udates. I had often sent my 'non-pinteresty" friends images via 'download image' for potential project ideas (I've actually converted a few toward pinterest). That feature has now been removed, and thus that ability is no longer available. It is what it is. You can find the same thing using Google.

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: I loved Pinterest for years and so many interesting things. However, sadly, my frustration is growing as these invasive ads are over the top. You can't look at much without an ad being shoved down your throat. I do not mind a few, but yikes over and over is too much. My friends and family deleted the app after years of collecting pins. I am considering the same. I don't expect management to care much, but if it continues, it could bring the downfall to what used to be a great app.

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column3: I love using the Pinterest app because it's loads of help when looking up clothing for historical research.. I greatly liked when it had the black background because, truth be told, I'm on it a lot when I'm in bed in the dark and the white is too glaring; however, after reading some reviews, if there were an option to toggle the black/white background that would be fantastic.

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: I wanted to give 5 stars because of how awesome Pinterest has been the past few months, though as of Feb 1 2022, the app suddenly pops up a message saying 'Validation error' whenever I use it. It said about 'something is wrong on our (I assume the app's) end. Please try again', and it is bothering me. I checked on both the Pinterest app and my email for a validation email of some sort but so far, I haven't gotten any. I hope it's just a temp bug and I hope you guys can fix it ASAP. Thank you.

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: Pinterest has grown to become my favorite social media app. I used it for drawing references, organizing hobbies, shows, anything I liked really. But lately Pinterest is downgrading. They removed the trying image option, which was one of my favorites because I could post pictures of drawings I referenced from the pin, and because I could see people's pets on animal pins. Recently they've removed the ability to send pins and message others, which is extremely unfortunate and annoying. Fix this.

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: I used to really love pinterest, but lately it sucks with how the app runs. It's really frustrating that I have to swap back and forth between wifi and my data to get things to load. I'd been convinced it was me for the longest time until I read the recent reviews on here, because it's a constant battle. this needs to be fixed already, it's been months of this nuisance.

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: I love the basic organization features but its become so annoying to use with all the ads and random bugs that appear out of nowhere on the app. A few months ago it was sounds playing out of nowhere, now I can't choose which board to save my pins on, instead it chooses for me, usually getting it wrong. It really sucks because pinterest is perfect for organizing projects for (art) school especially with the section feature but it seems like every couple of months it becomes unusable. :/

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
column3: Love Pinterest!!!! Great place to store all those ideas for things I will probably never do! Really though I use this app all the time! Yes I pin more things than I have time to do with but its a great place to get ideas and inspiration for just about anything! And I can keep it all organized in on place which makes it convenient when I do need it! Love you Pinterest, thank you for, if nothing else, making me feel like the Martha Stewart I always wanted to be!

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
column3: Great for finding inspiration for products and creating mood boards. I like how there are often links attached to photos so you can also view the website. I've only recently started to make my own boards and pins (with my own photos/description etc) and found it could be slightly easier to navigate. BUT overall a great app- simple but effective. It's definitely helped me over the years in piecing ideas together.

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column3: I've been using Pinterest for years and I have to say, the app is, by far, one of my most used and essential apps to keep on my phone. I have noticed one bug though. When I select a pin to view, and there is an add or some type of video next to the pin, the audio from the add/video will play while on the pin next to it... The pin that doesn't have any audio. If I go to look at the add/video then the video is resumed from where the audio stopped. I would love to see this bug fixed in the future.

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: a year or two ago I would have rated this five stars because I love Pinterest but this year things have changed. I get recommended random stuff I've never pinned before like cars and random girls with makeup on. also despite not using Pinterest as. frequently as I used to there seems to be a lot of repeated pins to the point where I have seen the exact same thing ten times. very annoying, please improve the algorithm. otherwise love this app!

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column3: I enjoy this app for collecting recipe ideas and useful tips. I appreciate that pins can easily be moved from one board to another. The only downside that I've found so far is all of the sponsored content, which isn't even a huge issue. It's all repetitive and irrelevant. There have been several occasions where the same pin (sponsored ad) is listed four times in a row, one right after another. But other than that, I love this app!

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
column3: This app is sometimes very useful to find an item or different versions of an item when researching one. I wish it did more to show the value of an item but is still a great tool to find what an item looks like to see if anything is missing or what all kinds of versions of it that it may be. This app is very easy to use. Plus not a bad time speeder for killing time by looking at different photos of just about anything you can think to look up. Not just a tool, but can be fun and even educational

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: Getting to find new things you've never seen, heard of or tried before is so interesting and I love Pinterest for it. However, it is glitchy and the ads are awful. If you find a board with an engrossing topic, it isn't unlikely to have to back out and start from the beginning because an add will pop up, over and over and over... Frustrating to say the least. While I love Pinterest for the creative ideas, the ads are aggravating and bothersome as Hell.

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
column3: Everytime I click on a post, I get pop ups on top of the other "The ad with Denzel Washington, Jennifer Lopez, etc." Even when you click on that X to close that ad, it doesn't close. You sometimes even end up going to other pages you didn't even want to go to due to all those pop ups and without even touching the ads. It is really exagerrated. That needs to get fixed for this app to be worth having. Eliminate the pop ups!

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column3: Pinterest has somehow managed to be one of the few social media platforms I can tolerate but there are two issues I've experienced. First is that images posted as comments are smaller than a penny which makes it nearly impossible to see. No amount of tapping/holding the image or rotating my phone will let me see it but others seem to. The other thing is sometimes videos/slideshows won't load and I'll have to go out and click back in for it to work. Would love if those were fixed! üòä

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: Disappointing üëéüëé After using this app for what seems years I have come to love the app.. until recently. I was looking up Christmas ideas when suddenly a loud and obnoxious ad started playing which was only coming from pinterest app, then when it finally finished and I went back to researching ads kept popping up randomly on the screen and wouldn't go away. Even when pressing the X to close the ad it still didn't go away and I couldn't see the item I was researching so I gave up. üò´üò¢üëé

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: When will Pinterest understand? I don't want ANY shopping recommendations! They added an option to get rid of shopping recommendations in settings, but I turned it off and I still get them. Apparently there's no way around it, so that setting does nothing. I also can't get rid of the annoying "Your Shopping List" section on my home page, which I don't want or need. I use this app for inspiration, never shopping. Pinterest, fix this!

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: I used to love this app and highly recommended it to everybody. But now it seems that the separate tabs of content streams specific to your individual boards are missing, which was its best feature of the app by far. Pls bring this back. I need hyper specificity! It's replaced with forcing a transition to video content in the opposite of a cohesive approach. I use Pinterest specifically for pictures and references as opposed to insta/TikTok, and videos REALLY break up my focus in the app.

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: why. can't. i. download. pictures!!!! everything was working fine until one day it decided it didn't want to save files anymore and anytime i want to download a picture, the same Failed to Save! bubble pops up. i have enough storage so memory space isn't really a problem. is there a way i can get this bug fixed? i tried deleting the cache and the data, and it still won't work.

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3:
When scrolling, my screen turns black & it happens every time. It's very frustrating especially when I've found something interesting to read & out of no where, there it goes again, BLANK SCREEN! I'm just about ready to give up on this app & not to mention the heart attack I almost get when I forget my volume is up & all of a sudden something starts to play in the background. & the ads covering my screen...forget about it. Pinterest could do better ‚ò?
March 24
column5: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column6: I love this app to its fullest but now I'm giving 3 stars cos some bug fixes are required in the current version, I'm unable to get search results, when I type something it keeps buffering for sometime and says 'something went wrong, try again later' and another pop up in red saying 'user experience could not be loaded'. Everything else including Feed and boards and working fine, something happened to the search options.

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: So I love this app, its a really good pinnacle for creativity...BUT, lately I've been irritated by the fact that my music is often interrruped by random audio when I click a pin. Sometimes its a weird noise, or people talking. Out of nowhere. I've come to conclusion that its ads attached to pins or something, cause on the main screen of the app is fine until I click a pin. So at this point the ads that appear in between pins are not enough. They're now playing with pins which is so pointless.

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column3: I have been using pinterest for 4 years now. It had been a cool app to use for the past 3 and a half years but recently I have been facing some issues regarding the sounds of the videos. Some videos do not play their sound despite the sound being available in my location. So please look into this issue as it's becoming really annoying.

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column3: I've been using this app for more than 7 years now and honestly it's my favourite social media. The only problem I've got is that there are too many tik toks on my home page and it makes it harder to find regular pins so if possible could some change (in settings) be brought in, that can help in reducing the number of short videos on the homepage to keep the watch and browse tabs separated.

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: I used to looove Pinterest! And I still do, but... The ads have gotten out of control!! I'll be scrolling through my feed and there will be 2 or 3 per page. And let's not even talk about how bad the search function is with ads! It's become so noticeable and unpleasant, it's severely hindered me from using the app I once loved! If this continues, Pinterest is doomed to become just another forgotten social media platform.

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: For years it worked fine but since half a year ago it would never load. It was stuck on the welcome page and the loading circle would just go on and on and on. After a few seconds the scrolling animation in the background even stops and the loading ball just keeps going and going and nothing happens. I tried EVERYTHING. When I say everything I mean everything. I even downloaded older versions but it was the same issue. Only the lite version works bc it goes through Chrome. That's my only option

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: Everyone should visit: ( BrowserGood. Com ) to install the best browser app. It's BLOCK ADS & FAST. I love Pinterest more than anything. It has been my favorite app/website for about 5 to 10 years now, and that won't change any time soon. It's especially great for the organization you can have, but it's recently gotten worse. I guess the algorithm for homepages has been tweaked in a recent update since now I'm getting a lot of pins in different languages or for stuff I've never cared about

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: None of the content, except advertisements, are loading. I have cleared data, cache, and miscellaneous; used both data and wi-fi. I have undownloaded and reinstalled the app- and it worked until I closed out of the app! Now, nothing will load. Even my profile icon is a gray screen. (I do have pictures) I will change my review to a five if this is fixed, as I truly love the app and use it for everything.

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
column3:
This is a great app and i love it and used to from the first day of starting to work with this app. It gives so many refernce images ,ideas,models and so much for each and every topic and aspect. It is the best place to grow creativity and get inspirational ideas and motivation. Thank you developers ! You made a great platform. Keep the good work going‚ú?
March 24
column5: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column6: Finally they fixed the app. Earlier when I would open a image and then another image under it, after returning back to the home page the app would refresh which really annoyed me. After the recent update it's fixed. The app is performing well now. I didn't give 5 stars cause there are two things that should be and can be improved. The first one includes making the commenting fast. After clicking the post button you have to wait for some time in order for it to get post. Second is the image post.

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column3: I love Pinterest! I use it for absolutely everything. I do like to keep all my boards private i use it more for personal then social (i like that they have this option). I do have a few suggestions though: Please add a button where you can type the first couple letters of your board, so when you're ready to pin, you don't have to scroll through your whole list (I have MANY boards). Also some things are repetitive, example I was looking for humor, and I barely found anything new. Thank you!

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: This app NOT unintuitive at all. Difficult for me to use and navigate. I have installed, then uninstalled several times because I'll want to "pin" something from a website, thinking it'll be a quick & convenient way to save something, rather than bookmarking the page, or noting it some other way. But, doing this is cumbersome and frustrating. I can't even find a way to delete something from a "board" or a "wish list" if I need to. Good riddance once again.....

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: Pinterest used to be a great resource for every kind of subject. I use it mostly for cooking and getting a recipes. BUT NOW... it is unbearable with all the pop-up adds! I cannot get through a recipe without cursing! Having to 'X' out all of the Very Tiny!! Adds!! That open when I try to close them. I know you need to make money, but Pinterest has lost a lot of my time searching on it. It just TOO Frustrating.

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: The app (usually) is fine enough for accessing Pinterest, but any time something is amiss, there's no way to report bugs from within the app. Plus, it seems that recently they added a strange clicking sound only when hitting the button to save a post to your boards while viewing the post directly, with no way to turn it off despite there being no other audio in the app outside of watching videos.

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: it's a good app except random videos keep showing up on my feed despite me having blocked the accounts the videos come from. the videos quiet down the music I'm listening to while using the app and it keeps the volume down even after I stop the video. to get the volume back to normal I have to close my music app multiple times and start the song over and over all because a video I specifically said I didn't want to see started playing.

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
column3: This incredibly built application is ideal if you're seeking for aesthetically pleasant, high-quality photographs that are also free, simple to use, and ad-free. Additionally, it uses little storage space on your device. It's simple to share your artistic creations with others and find inspiration from great images. I fully recommend this application.

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: I hate this app. It is so untidy. It was much better in 2014 where the 'likes' were still available, I don't even know where to download pictures, it's much harder to find some options. You need to minimalize the interface. The repin algorithm for is so annoying, it always messes up the category. I love the content and I use it for years, but I hate the interface.

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: Really love it and use it super often, but there are way too many ads now (serously, literally every other post is an ad) and there's a bug that plays random audio from some video I never clicked on. I kinda understand the ads since it's a free app and at least they're not pop-ups! It'd also be nice if you could create limitless sections within sections.

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column3: I love pinterest, though I am finding recently that a lot of the content is repeated and the ads are getting on ny nerves! I will still use it, though I wish there was a method for indicating that you have already seen a pin 100 times. Sometimes I am given the option, other times I am not. Also an option for "this pin no longer works" would be fab.

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
column3: At first I thought it was just for DIY ideas and your basic tutorials and while that's all good it's not really my thing. I first downloaded it because I thought I could get art ideas from it and boy they did not disappoint, I've had this app for about a year and I'm always finding new ideas and really great art. Not only that but I also use it to find funny tumblr post or memes and I could spend hours on there laughing. You can really find anything on pintrest and I think it's worth a download.

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column3: Pretty good, mainly use it for downloading images and finding different styles. Pretty good at suggesting images that match those you've interacted with - and seems to be fairly fast at taking down stolen pictures/art (or at least as fast as it can be) which is good for creators. No real complaints, other than its annoying you can't save ad pins/pictures for later reference, but that's understandable!

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: This was once my fav app. But when the UX design hit wrong... I... I can't even look at it. Do you even realized that the design covered the photos? That < and search icon are. I think someone need to redo the edge of the picture page too. Please update the design. One more, I know that there is a "more ideas" ontion on the board. But can you make it so that we can just choose the board/section, and then go to search mode in order to pick. Instead of picking first then select the board/section.

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
column3: My experience in Pinterest was so awesome and i really loved using Pinterest. But, i didn't use it for a long time cause of my busy schedules and a week ago, i cleared all my cache in Pinterest and restarted it again. But, when i opened the open the app after doing so, it just keeps on loading and doesn't open the app interface. I deleted and installed Pinterest a lot cause of this problem but still, it's still remaining the same way. Help me out please, i really love this app :)

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: I HATE the new feature that adds music to regular pictures. When I'm enjoying a silent scroll through Pinterest and click on a picture to get a better look at it, I do not expect to hear music and it scares the living daylights out of me every single time. Music and sound on the videos and the ads are expected, but please get rid of the music on the pins that are just meant to be pictures! I prefer Pinterest the way it was when I first signed up: pictures only, no sound, lovely silence.

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column3: When people asked "is Pinterest still relevant?", I'd always say "are you kidding, Pinterest is still as great as ever and I'm keeping it on my phone!" But honestly, now that there's ads, it changes everything. It ruins the whole experience. It makes it aesthetically displeasing. I'm on the verge of deleting it. I'm better off creating a real mood board with paper etc. that has exactly what I want on it.

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: I've been a Pinterest fan since the very beginning. However, recently all these videos of nobodys trying desperately to get screen time and ad videos populating my feed can make anyone feel overwhelmed. Not the app with the personalized feed anymore. Instead its became another place for ads to bombard you. Wishing there was an option to turn off all this with a simple click. Not have to individually block each post only to have it learn to show you different ads.

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: The "swipe left to go back to the home screen" function on this app is ridiculous annoying. I want to disable that completely. When I am happily scrolling along, if my finger goes even just very slightly diagonally then I am suddenly back at the pinterest home screen, when I don't want to be, causing me to lose the path of interesting images I clicked on, and not being able to get back to them.

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: This app cannot handle popups in the target page - it takes AGES to respond to clicks, meaning a page with two or three popups can take almost a minute to get to the actual content. The only way round it is to open the page in the browser instead of the app. This has been the case for a long time, but due to the sheer number of cookie permission popups, it's getting more and more difficult to use. Please fix this! Also please make it possible to open external Pinterest links in the app.

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: Seriously this app has been my go to for years! But recently, it doesn't loads pins, it doesn't downloads them, it doesn't lets me view them and this has been going on for about a month now. I have to open & close my app again & again for it to work. And yes, I do check my internet connection when this happens and it is fine! Other apps work perfectly it's just Pinterest! I thought maybe updating it would solve my problem but it still hasn't! Please solve this issue.

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: The only things I don't like (so far) is when I'm trying to pin something and Pinterest blocks it because it might lead to spam. If I want that pin, the spam is my problem! Also, after I have saved something in a folder, please stop showing me the same thing over & over!!! Wish there was a place to select a language, so I'm not seeing instructions in a foreign language... app lags and crashes when I've been using it for 10-15 minutes.

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: I typically really love the app! But lately I haven't been able to edit or even write a description for any of my boards. I can see the space to do it, but nothing happens when I click on it. Also, it's very difficult, confusing, and a bit frustrating trying to organize the pins, since there is no method to the way they move around once you've gone into the 'organize' area. Otherwise I enjoy the app.

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: Firstly,I have been using pinterest from very long time and i really love it.. The recent update is very very bad. When i am selecting an image it's opening image but big and under that visit,save buttons which are also very big. The new User interface design is very bad. Under that we can't see any image unless i scroll down. The previous version is very good. When i selected i image i can see the image and along with i can see other image's without scrolling. Please bring back previous version

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column3: My app crashes EVERY DAY and I have a high speed, high capacity, brand new, 2019 phone. this app now crashes constantly and ads randomly play out loud and I can't even source the ad to silence it. I can move from different areas in the app, make different searches, and THE AD KEEPS PLAYING out of nowhere. this used to not be a problem. I miss what it was like before. I use Pinterest literally every day for SO MANY things amd its the only app of mine that crashes. please fix this if you can.

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
column3: Easy to navigate and lots of options for search ideas, etc. The suggested/trending search function is great. One negative is that the ads can really get in the way. This can be frustrating when trying to follow a tutorial. I have had to abandon some pinned tutorials (eg. Sewing) because I couldn't properly see all of it due to ads.

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: I use Pinterest every day!! But it has a couple glaring problems with the app. First off, when I open the app, it's finicky with bringing up the home/search/my pins buttons. It takes a lot of swiping up and down in order to be able to randomly make these buttons appear so I can search for something specific. Also, if I ever try to click on a pin, the visit it within the Pinterest app, it's very difficult to click on anything within that page. Usually I just open it in a regular internet window

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column3: i love the app, im addicted. i just get annoyed when it crashes or wont open and I have to reinstall, but i think that's just my cruddy internet. Really though, its so fun and easy to use and organize and has everything from cute house and diy ideas to recipes and just nice hobbies and fashion. its great for a writer like me to make little aesthetic boards for my characters, too.

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: Hi. I love this app. I've had it for years. BUT lately it's been glitching so badly. I check if there's an update to fix it and everytime there's an update, but even after updating, it's still glitching. I can't even scroll through it bc it lags so much. Please fix it. I miss Pinterest. I'm keeping hope that it will be fix once and for all. :(

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: I'd love to give it more stars but the app is basically useless without being able to filter searches. There's no way to click on keywords like before, no filter button, and I can't even filter within the search box like other search engines. There's also way too many ads and promoted content for every search instead of individual content from other creators. Please fix this. It seems with every update, the app gets worse. This app used to be great. üòî

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column3: I use pintrest all the time for inspiration, ideas, and cute fanart and other stuff. But the problem is recently my notifications have stopped working without me changing any of the settings. The bell will show there's new updates, but when I go to check, it doesn't actually show anything new. Just today, I opened the notification tab after it showed I had 4 new updates, and the latest one that showed was from 6 days ago. Idk what the problem is, but it's getting annoying so I hope it gets fixed

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: While I like Pinterest, the app is frustrating. The "Saved!" pop-ups cover menu access; overstay their welcome; and 90% of the time, read an attempt to swipe them away as a click. That the menu dots, save/etc. buttons, and back arrow are so spaced out on the screen is difficult for those us with smaller hands. Also, a pox on whoever decided an image search should open every time I inevitably bump an image trying to reach the back arrow. Not great in terms of user experience.

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: Not sure what's going on with the Following tab. Sometimes it's there; sometimes it's not. And when it is there is not showing me the individual boards I've carefully curated over the years, and it's suggesting that I follow other people. I don't mind ads; it's a free app after all, but not getting the pins I want in my feed basically renders it useless to me, side from accessing pins I've saved.

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: 2022 Update: -1 ‚≠êÔ∏è, half the feed is ads. This app just keeps getting worse with each update. Now I cant even mass delete pins when trying to organize my boards. The last update changed the interface, making it harder to discover to organize boards and look for pins. Over the past year, the app has gotten glitchey and more annoying to use. The homepage refreshes itself randomly. When you click on a pin and the recommended pins under it, the app randomly switches to the homepage for no reason.

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
column3: I do enjoy this app with it pictures and different artwork. It all wonderful and beautiful. There is a problem with the app though. Since the last couple updates there been problem with download pictures or Gifs. I can't get them to download and the option to download isn't showing up at all. It just disappear. I would like for this problem to be fixing in the next couple updates. I also would like for more private setting option. Even with this problem though I still give 5 star.

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column3: Decent app for collecting art and other ideas. However the app suffers from one fatal flaw that they seem to not want to bother their time with despite demand. That is the ability to download an entire board or to atleast chain downloads, this would make life so much easier and convenient, especially with new phone that you cant transfer old saves from

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
column3: I loving finding recipes, crafts and more.

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: The original concept is good but options that made the application great have been removed or altered. One feature is the suggested readings or recommendations. In the past, I could choose what type of content I wanted via a rating-like feature and there was also a large selection to choose from. That is gone. Now, Pocket feeds you what they want you to read outside of what you save from other places online. Also, the selection and point of view are limited. Yes, more mind control please.

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: I love the concept of Pinterest and I know I'll never get rid of it because the images on there are amazing, but the app itself is glitchy, full of ads, and doesn't work well. A lot of things including seeing who I follow, who follows me, finding other people is either really difficult or just doesn't work. It would be amazing if this app got fixed, but sadly I do not think it ever will.

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: I use this app every day for multiple things; one of those things is messaging friends. I've seen a huge handful of people speaking about this stupid glitch that has shown up within the past few weeks... the messaging has simply stopped working. we've tried clearing the cache, uninstalling and reinstalling, I evwn tried restarting my phone. nothing is working. all of my conversations are just gone, and I can't send any messages; which is incredibly upsetting.

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: Barely 48hrs after downloading this app it freezes. It doesn't refresh. When I try to do so I get an error message saying "user not found" . I end up deleting the app and downloading it again. Same thing happens. This has happened more than I care to count. I have even gone as far as clearing the cache and app data. No change. Apparently the app wants me to keep deleting and downloading it back every other day. No thank u I'm sticking with the web.

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column3: I love this app. I love that when I search something I can click on a certain image and then see similar things to just that image. it's pretty easy to find what I'm looking for, or great ideas. The only thing that bugs me is when you click on a pictures link alot of the times it's broken, or the site has been shut down, or is goes somewhere completely unrelated. I don't know pintrest can fix these broken links, or atleast take off the ones that go nowhere or go to a malicious site.

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column3: It's an amazing app, beyond comparison. I'd have given it a five star if not for the fact that sometimes it just doesn‚Äôt load at all or just freeze outta nowhere. I tried clearing my storage, using the app on other devices, using WiFi or data, but nothing completely fixes the issue n I feel so frustrated. Please try n fix this asap. Thank you.

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
column3: I absolutely love this app! It's fun, user-friendly, and keeps me occupied for hours pinning ideas and inspiration for my personal projects. I really enjoy interacting with other pinners from around the globe! I also like the fact that it's good, clean fun...very little inappropriate nonsense. My Pinterest experience has always been positive and fun! I'm looking forward to many more years of wonderful and interesting pins!

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: I absolutely adore this app and have for years but as of yesterday, any images I try to download aren't actually saving to my phone. I read through some other reviews and was relieved to see that it wasn't just me having this issue and that it's not an issue with my phone but am now wondering whether it's likely to be fixed soon as I also use this app for college course inspo and need images off it. I hope it gets sorted soon. If this issue were resolved I would 100% give it 5 stars

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: a great app that i have used for years. lately though about 80% of all videos on my recommendations have "no audio available" which happened very suddenly which is a shame. the fact that you can also not pause pins with more than one video is also very frustrating. all of my issues seem to be surrounding videos and sadly that negatively affects the user experience.

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: I loved using Pinterest for years, but the user experience has really gone downhill recently. Every third pin is an ad, the home feed refreshes anytime you navigate away from it, and the home feed algorithm makes everything a slightly different version of the last 5 pins you clicked on, creating an extremely monotonous experience. I spent hours finding inspiration on Pinterest when I first got my account in 2013, but it's so frustrating and disappointing to engage with now.

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: I keep coming back to Pinterest as it's a fantastic app WHEN it works, but that - sadly - never seems to last. When scrolling through the search, topics and home feed, pins often loop and it's very picky with where it redirects after saving (or showing up in your history). And NOW all my chosen topics have disappeared and my home feed won't refresh. I've restarted my phone, reinstalled the app and created an entirely separate account to double-check but nothing works. Great idea, poor execution!

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: Dear Pinterest, The content are getting much better than the previous version. But I'm having a problem with saving images/gifs. They aren't available in my gallery although I've clicked save image many times. What's happening? I hope you will fix this as soon as possible. Thank you for your attention.

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
column3: Love it . . . ANY songs from my favorite music libraries at my fingertips! I must tell you that I find it hard to fathom that, NO other music service has anything compareable to this GEM ! Keep doin' it guys and gals. I believe every word that I've written about the service and mobile app. When you're 66 and partially disabled, there is alot of free time to pick a spot, slap on the Beats and Enjoy the music of my life. Thank you Michael

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: I've been a heavy user of this app for years across several phones, usually very satisfied, but lately it's been awful? It wont load more than a couple of screen's worth of pins when I browse, meaning that to see more I have to refresh; instead of casually browsing I have to stress over saving immediately. App keeps freezing; only way to unfreeze is to close--which makes me lose pins I was looking at. Music plays loudly at random even though I turned off video autoplay. Frustrating experience :(

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: Pintrest is AMAZING! But.. *Attention Pintrest* The new version is frustrating because u can't access your quicksave profile/board anymore. I tried to find results on how to find it via google. No luck. On an iPhone board lists are in alphabetical order (of all your boards). You can click on the letter and it skips down to the letter. on Android unfortunately you need to scroll all the way down the lists which takes forever. Which is why quicksave is so awesome.. But u can't access it now!

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: This app can no longer do the only thing I still use it for, which is saving recipes. When I go into the pinned websites, the popups make navigating slow and the popups lead me to other sites. It's such a frustrating experience, I might as well navigate with my web browser because at least that has better ad blocking. I'm leaving this review because I hope these issues will be addressed before I stop using this app and find a solution. Very sad because I've used this app for a very long time.

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: The app was great until the update where it automatically saves everything to your profile. Why would you make me go through more steps just to save a photo or recipe?? Why would I bother making boards if they're going to make the app useless by throwing them all together and making me save them twice. Hoping they get rid of this "feature" in the next update. It's annoying.

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: This app is truly amazing, but since the recent update, I'm having problem opening it. It loads and loads, and tells me to check my connection when my connection is perfectly fine. I'm sure many of us are having the same problem. PLEASE fix this issue. I can't live without this app, there's so many ideas I've pinned and it's an amazing app to download free pictures so I will truly appreciated if you guys fix it ASAP.

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: Buggy and the interface changes keep making it less usable. First of all the app plays ad audio when the ad isn't visible making for very loud surprises sometimes. Then they added an image search button on top of the post image making difficult to see part of the post. Now they have added large black rounded areas at the top of posts that block even more of the images. It is getting to be unusable.

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: Loved the app, been using it for years and have multiple boards with over 1k+ worth of content saved... But last few days the main page is usable in terms of saving an image now. I can no longer long press to save images quickly or share with friends and it's frustrating open each thing individually to save it... I can't find a setting that could've possibly done this and so idk how to find out how to fix it... Not to mention so many ads it's next to impossible to accurately find what I want.

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: New update makes it really tedious and annoying to save something. I have to scroll all the way down to the board I actually want to use, every single time, the auto save to profile feature just makes board filling time consuming and hard to find if you mess up. It's so much easier to just save to what you previously saved something as, and then change from there. Also been having completely irrelevant pins all over my dash that won't go away eventhough I have no boards enabled for them.

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: More and more ads as time goes on. I can only imagine in a couple of years when it's completely ads. Also don't forget to mute your phone before you open Pinterest! As "mute videos" and "don't autoplay videos" doesn't apply to ads! Shame, since some days I'd like to listen to music while browsing, but that would get in the way of ads I guess!

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: I like the app, don't get me wrong; I can get stuck in it for half an hour if I'm not careful. However, the constant ads are ridiculous, and they're advertising things I would absolutely never look at despite my telling the app to hide the ad due to its irrelevance. Another thing I don't like is that in the bottom right hand corner of every pin is a shaded icon which makes reading certain pins impossible. If that could be removed, that would be wonderful.

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: Love the app for organising and finding resources and information, but the Android mobile version is super glitchy with constant error messages. Just trying to do a simple sort of my pins into sections in a folder has been problematic due to the process constantly crashing and/or not giving me the option to choose a previously created section. Getting really tired of those "Something went wrong" messages üò©

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: Recommend changing the name of "home feed" to "force feed" since we no longer have an option to tune it. Can't turn any of the pins on or off, and all are defaulted to off. I don't want to see food pins. It's not in my favorites, and the more I select them as not relevant, seen too many times, etc, the more they show up. I have tried blocking them. Now they show up almost exclusively. Thanks for ruining what used to be a fun app.

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: I use pinterest daily organizing planning my day meals and parties. I love using it! However, lately its been superslow if not working and it says "oops not working on our end" Its been like this for like two weeks and when I get it to work I use the search engine and i can scroll at the options twice before I'm just looking at colored boxes that never load. Just really upsetting when your trying plan a party and cant see your own album and have end up using google. Hope things get fixed soon.

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: I loved this app years ago when there were no ads. As they've added them in, I've used the app less and less. With the latest update, the app is so laggy I am on less than 1 minute before I'm too frustrated to continue. In conjunction with the inappropriateness of the latest ads, I just have no interest. Furthermore, I tried the "contact us" link Pinterest posts on their website to inform them of the extreme lag, and it leads to broken URL message. I'm very done with companies such as this.

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: Love the content but hate the app. All links when viewed through the app, have major issues with touch sensitivity just not registering properly. Eg. when viewing a YouTube link through the app, playing, pausing and skipping ads requires tapping the button literally dozens of times and each time you can see the button on the screen depress like it knows what you want it to do but it refuses to do it. Extremely frustrating

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: I have used pinterest for years and i've seen a lot of changes on the app, and by far, the most intolerable one is that i can no longer hold down an image to save it. I have to click on each image instead of having a smooth scrolling experience. Its disruptive to what i'm used to and i dont really want to use pinterest anymore. This was honestly a huge step back in user experience and intuitiveness, especially when compared to so many other social apps.

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars

However I have no clue what the deal is but I always get stuff I'm not interested in even though I try to select only specific things I'm interested in.

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars

If the problems get fixed I'll update my review, and put 5 stars.

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: Too many ads! It is really ruining what used to be a great platform. I know ads bring revenue but it's not subtle and really ruining the user experience.

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: It's an awful app that goes out of its way to make things inconvenient for you. It hijacks browser searches, it prioritizes irrelevant recommended posts, and constantly provides notifications that it found another collection of irrelevancy completely unrelated to your other pins. The ONLY use of this app is making it easier to pin from browser. Even then, some sites are inexplicably blacklisted. The page image search is also slow and almost never finds images on Chrome; you have to "share".

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: I love the app itself, you can pin pictures and videos, you can follow people to see more of their pictures and things, and more..BUT! When it asks at the start what topics you like, and lets you select them to get more photos about those chosen topics, oh no! That's a nice feature, but then whenever they find a new chosen topic related picture, they notify me. ON MY EMAIL. Just because I said I liked animals doesnt mean I want endless spam. I don't know how to stop it notifying me! Please help!

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars

I also wish my created pins showed up. A few of them don't show up on my profile but they show up in the boards I've added them to. Otherwise I like all the features. It helps a ton for visuals and creating a vibe for my books.

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: While I use it a lot & generally enjoy it, the app & website continues to have nonstop bugs & glitches, especially every time it's updated. It's incredibly frustrating, especially when I'm unable to find other people having similar issues. Another thing that is annoying is when functions that were well-liked are removed or changed, such as adding descriptions when re-pinning. I don't highly recommend the app for repeated, every day use.

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: Like many others on here Pinterest has gone to the money maker wayside, and doesn't care about us the user. Too many ads, too many pins that are the same because I did one search, too many problems with error messages or being able to find my search/home buttons. On the other side I love the new capability of creating sub folders, very handy! Please go back to showing random pins and way less ads! Thank you

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
column3: Once a friend showed me pinterest, I started using the website, and soon, the app. I've reached the point to where I don't use it too often because it's soo addicting! Once I start downloading, I can't stop! But that's what's so good about it! About half of my photo gallery, and ALL of my wallpapers are pinterest!! I do have one complaint though, after a while, I start seeing more, well, "adult" images. Overall though, it's a great app, and I highly recommend it to anyone in the right age range.

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: I've been a user of this app for several years. In 2016 Pinterest made a move in the right direction, when they allowed users to turn off suggested content. I noticed that recently they have returned back to their old devices, which is unfortunate. I highly recommend that pinterest follow user requests and improve by returning to this setting which allows for more autonomy.

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: I miss the old Pinterest... All kinds of issues since recent and latest updates, making it really unpleasant to use. And the loud music from ads that screams from my phone until I close the app. Why is this happening? Pinterest is one of my favorite things in life, and it keeps getting worse instead of better, makes me sad. Can we get a dark mode option on the app, please?

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars

It makes me use the app less.

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars

ADDICTIVE!

This can be found on Pinterest Web and it makes things easier. Kindly bring this to the mobile app

column3: This is a great app and i love it!! but it really really ticks me off when the page reloads itself when you first open the app, I'll be in the middle of reading something and it be interesting and then the page will reload and I cant find it again. Also when the page reloads.. the new page does not load the content.

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: Getting tired of force closings. Updated the app on my Samsung A42 and it still freezes, force closing, exits out of app without my prompting. I don't know what the developers are doing, but it's almost like they are ADDING bugs, rather than removing them. Have cleaned cache, restarted phone and still it freezes or crashes REPEATEDLY. Get your act together, developers!

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: I love using pinterest for cute wallpapers for my phone. However, I find it incredibly DUMB, that you have to go about the most obnoxious way, of downloading pictures now. It use to be, you could just hold down on the image and QUICK select the download option, but with the new update, you geniuses have made the decision to take that away. WORST UPDATE EVER!!!!!

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: super useful app for a super useful platform BUT notifications from the app are extremely agressive, you dismiss one type and 5 other pop up clatering your screen. forces you to kill all notifications from the app. second big issue, trying to save from chrome on android keeps popping a message about suspicious link or some other nonsense when it is clearly nothing of the sort. hitting on the help option for this issue lands you on a 404 error page. would never expect such things from Pinterest.

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column3: The app itself is awesome&inspirational; it is just disappointing (&misleading); when you open a free pattern/a specific photo of something and when you open it; the content is something completely different or the pattern is not free or in the language indicated. Apart from that, thank you for being a wonderful app to inspire us all!

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: I logged onto the app as normal and it signed me out! It wouldn't load or do anything, it just claimed that my connection wasn't stable/working. I tried reinstalling, restarting my phone, deleting cache data, everything! It seems to be broken now, I'm extremely disappointed and frustrated. Wish I could go back to the previous version. Update: It was fixed for a short period of time, before I clicked on a notification from a message and Pinterest broke yet again! Disappointed.

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column3: I'm giving it a four out of five stars, because every time I've logged into it since the day before yesterday. It doesn't load all the way or it freezes for some reason. And then I have to close that swiping all the way closed. And go back into it for it to work. Please fix the bugs of this app. I like going to it for quote pictures and for food inspiration. And I'm also planning on redoing my bedroom. So I need inspiration for that. But with it freezing all the time now. it's kind of hard 2.

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column3: II spend a lot of time here but it's kinda annoying that whenever I see a pin that would be before or after a video while listening to my music the music will stop because of the video I'm not watching! So I have to be constantly trying to avoid the pins near a video while listening to something else because sometimes it will even close the music app.

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars

Here's the suggestion: What if there's a search bar icon on the top side so you can search for the board you're looking for, in order to get easier access. Also the pictures in the comment things should come back. dunno

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: It's alright, but every time I try and save pins into my board, it says that it's blocked it cause im spamming

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: I dont like the new features, they're annoying. Please don't try to be like other social media and keep your originality! Also I downloaded a bunch of photos and they got downloaded as 0 bytes and they weren't recognized as files which is a huge problem! This has been happening for over a month. Also why did you remove the best feature of the home screen? I know it still exists, to browse pins based on collections, but it was more convenient when it was on the homescreen. Put it back!

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
