column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: They did it. They finally did it. The newest update is so bad it's made the app unusable. Instead of fixing app-breaking bugs, Pinterest decided to ruin their own layout to make it impractical & an eye sore, got rid of the mass edit/delete/manage/move function so that you can no longer edit boards, the descriptions keep disappearing & it's been crashing ever since the update. I use this app for my job but I can no longer use it after this update. I don't know what I'm going to do.

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
column3: I love Pinterest and all the ideas it gives me. The only thing I do not like is the constant sugestion of religious stuff. I wish we could customize it to say "no" to certain things. column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column3: There are a few new things that aren't my favorite, such as not having the options of what to do with a pin pop up after a prolonged tap, and this "follow creators" Instagram story style of thing could very quickly become annoying, but other than that, I like what this app is now, which is still an idea-sharing community. I hope it doesn't descend any further into ads, but we all know that ultimately everything does.

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: App auto-downloads fishy (no sound) mp3 file, which appearred in my recently added music list. It doesn't appear to be harmful, but could be bypassing my AV scanner because of mp3 extension. I couldn't trace where this file comes from, but it was stored in Pinterest folder on my phone internal storage. Even after deleting it several it kept coming back. You guys should improve your browser security. I just cleared the app's cache. If the file comes back I'll rate this app 1-star.

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars

If the app is just going to turn into another outlet for social media "stars" and tiktok videos I'm not sticking around.

Thank you, Pinterest - it's been so much fun!

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: Has loud ads that play on loop until you close the app. Also the algorithm isn't great and samples so many bored people killing time that you have to be very careful not to save trendy things or assembling inspiration boards unrelated to, say, unrealistic preteen fashion ideals or wine mom aesthetics will completely go out the window. If something even remotely involves calligraphy, wine, South Asian culture, homes, or any series/idea that has ever been popular on Tumblr, you must not click.

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars

If you can think of it or look for it...you'll most likely find it. The app., is so well designed and operated. I recommend it to anyone.

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column3: I like it allotüíï just too much non-How to do it. It's algorithms like its offering you similar things based on object recognition it often sends you down a "rabbit hole" searches that are pure advertising driven in what choices Pinterest will let you see first, second third. The basic placement ads are expected, and helpful. Example:looking for an idea to painting a flower pot you will get 10 chain& private stores selling the finished ones online, or selling supplies, then the how to guides.

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars

Please make it stop. Let me scroll Pinterest in peace

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars

If anyone knows of a good alternative, please let me know.

It's really, Really annoying me. Would love a fix

It was easier to look into subsections while searching for something. Like when I searched for say, painting the tabs would show cartoons, portraits, city, still life and more little tabs underneath the search bar. It was really really great. Plz bring it back if possible.

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column3: I really love this app but there's a lot of bugs in it that need fixing. for example, notifications not working or not appearing, comments being turned off automatically on pins and not being able to turn them on, not being able to see comments people make on your pins besides in notifications, and the send button disappearing when you put an emoji in a comment (for reference I use an android 11 phone). If this app got an update that fixed the bugs I'd give it 5 stars haha üòÖ

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column3: Excellent for alternative ideas and suggestions.

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: I've been using this app for at least 4 years and as much as I enjoy it, there are several things that need improvement: 1- TOO MANY ADS! For each pin I see, I see 3 ads. I can't even find the pins I searched for & somehow, the app prioritizes loading ads on loading pins 2- notifications are wrong! I get notifications about someone liking my comment or replying to it, then I check and there's nothing. Sometimes the notification badge is there but there's nothing 3- pins failing to be saved!

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
column3: Ever since I discovered Pinterest, on all the phones I had, I made sure to have Pinterest on them. Better than fbook and so many ideas and creations. Top rank to Pinterest from my side. ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: I really dislike what you've done to the app. I can't watch videos without the sound automatically being turned on or simetimes not having a way to pause/stop it. Some of the more creative features you've removed. I very seldomly recommend this app anymore. It's a shame. It used to be such fun to use, watch and share. Very disappointed.

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column3: Please add a feature to pin multiple images at once from my phone storage. When pinning an image to a board I have to go to that exact folder to where the picture is and select it (which is fine). My only gripe is if I have 15 images to upload I have to go through this process 15 times. All in all the app is great and it gets more things right than it does wrong. My favorite feature would have to be the night mode/battery saver mode when Pinterest looks like it's dark themed.

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column3: Great for organizing images, browsing art, and checking out entertaining posts. I enjoy the freedom of being able to save any kinds of images and being able to thoroughly organize my saves so I can easily find and view them later. I only have minor complaints about the app, such as the max description character cap. being a bit too short.

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: Can be fun to use sometimes after a lot of tweaking. The notifications are nonsense, literally. They will never take you to the things being shown off and even often bait you onto the app by saying you have notifications you don't actually have. Once ALL notifications are turned off it's a bit more useable. Still has gone downhill significantly in the last 5 years.

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: It has been such a great app up until recently. There has been so many changes to the appearances, which I don't really mind it just kinda makes it little too hard to get use to because of how many times it gets changed. What I DO mind however is the bugs surrounding the boards and its irritating functions. I can only add 1000 pins to a section, and even if i do reach the limit, nothing happens! No changes to the numbers the section had originally. I tried readding but still nothing.

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: For some reasan Pinterest doesnt want me to have their app. whenever I install it on my phone they shut me down. I have other devices with no problems. I even had it on my phone then one day it stopped and now I can't get it back and if I do I still will have lost the thousands of interesting images. I had saved like cropcircles, funny quotes, Minicoopers, sunsets and dozens more. Thanks pinterest.

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column3: Overall, it's a great app that allows me to browse cute images. My only problem is that the Watch button, supposedly beside the Browse button, isn't appearing on my app. Thus, I am just able to browse through images and some videos but there are no options for me to browse just videos. Hope this gets fixed.

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars

I don't see the point of you guys actually thinking by putting this quick-save-to-profile feature would be a big convenience for the users. This feature just makes it complicated for us to save pins and messy at some point. It would be better if you guys remove this dumb feature.

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: It used to be amazing but just keeps getting worse and worse. I wish I could develop apps because I'd bring back the old one. All the freaking ads are ridiculous. Not to mention I have all kinds of things selected to see in my feed but I only see the last four things I clicked on OVER and OVER. You used to get all kinds of new and interesting things but now everything is in its own tabs so you get millions of the same thing. I hate it! I miss Pinterest. Sell outs...you should be ashamed!

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars

No matter what I search for it's only giving me one result and most of the time that result isn't even related to what I searched for. I've tried different things like switching accounts, restarting my phone, checking my internet connection, ect, but nothing has worked. Please fix this its really frustrating that I can't search for the pins I actually want to see

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: This app was perfect over 5 years ago. Used to be easy to talk find and colab with other people. Now the UI is horrible and not user friendly. The buttons, like, and pin options don't even work on multiple phone types which were new btw. So you have to manually press like 4 or 5 buttons to save something when you should be able to just hold and add it. That's how it was before. Descriptions hover over other buttons too long when editing so have to wait. Plz fire the ppl who made it worse. üëéüèæ

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: I have been using Pinterest for years and have enjoyed it until last year. The constant updates make the app less than great. More ads than a "free" mobile game, weird and almost nonfunctional layout changes, recommending me completely unrelated content to what I save, and the random loud, screamy ads despite me having the app sound off make using the app more of a chore than a fun experience.

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: I love it but I will love it much more if the videos can be downloaded like the pictures. New: I struggle to upload my work from my android phone! I have to log in with my laptop before I can upload which is also a different struggle on its own!

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: This app used to be good but now there is no everything page so unless you are looking for something specific it leaves you browsing the homescreen - which is highly repetitive (to say the least). They don't listen to requests to not show certain pins (Because I've seen them a couple of dozen times) and there is a lot of poorly disguised commercial content. Too bad, because Pinterest used to be fun to browse through. Edited down a star - the deluge of cheap/irrelevant paid ads is üëé

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: All ads. I'd pay for an ad-free version because the ads truly ruin the experience. Looking at Pinterest on my phone, there are two columns of pins, with an occasional large ad that takes up both column widths. I just did a quick count and 6 out of 7 pins in a row on the right side were all ads. They're usually somewhat more dispersed, but I rarely get a full page scroll without an ad these days.

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: I only updated it cause I can no longer see some comments and replies but after the update it just got worse. The usernames are on the side of the screen as if there were huge spaces on them. I can't fully view a single pin and it keeps lagging when I scroll. I can't also view my notifications. All in all it's so disappointing since I didn't experience these problems before. They could've done better than this sht

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: Its one of my must have apps but recently I'm not sure whats happening but all of a sudden I'll search something i have before and then it pops up saying there are no related searches, it won't even try to figure out what i meant, i.e. "Anime girl". And when i click on an image to find similar images to it, NOTHING will pop up related it would be something that I looked at for a second separately. I don't know whats going on but its frustrating.

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: Pinterest used to be enjoyable but over the years, it's just disintegrated more and more into an unusable mess. Instead of being able to pick what board a pin is saved to like in the past, it now just gets sent to your profile as a "quick save" and there's extra steps you have to take to move it to the board you want it on. Moving and organizing pins is also ridiculously glitchy, i transferred several pins from an old account i had and 80% of them somehow deleted themselves 30 minutes later.

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
column3: I have found great joy in using this app, it has introduced me to a number of new concepts in design, layout, structure, colour scheme, electrical and mechanical settings which i did not have access to before. Also the manner in which the slides are presented gives the accessor complete control over the manner they can distrubute or analyse the info presented thus make on spot decissions to save or to pass , just the right kind of stuff i needed. Thanks alot to your staff and team organisers.

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars

The only problems I have with app is that it gets confusing at times. Like when I save a picture it took me a long time to realize and looking for the browser website took long time. The visual search should have more features like the new google lens. Also it's hard to realize their is community in pinterest that people don't see.

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars

I am still learning the technical side of the application and hope for it becoming more intuitive with time and use.

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
column3: An array of great ideas for home, crafting, and party planning. My favorite sites include all materials to upcycle.

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: I'm not sure if there is any sort of moderation that goes on, but if it's not an ad, most pins are misleading or will straight up direct to something completely different, and if I flag it, another one just like it pops right up within a week. I used to use Pinterest as my go-to search engine for crafts and diys, but recently I've had less hassle and more success by just googling what I'm looking for.

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars

So a lot of small problems that destroy the experience...

Otherwise I love this app it's really helpful for me, I use it all the time :)

Can you please offer an inexpensive but paid version without ads?

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars

One enhancement I'd really appreciate would be the option to always explore linked photos/notes directly from the pin without having to go to the external link every time. I get clicking to learn more, but more context and visual in the pin would be a much better experience!

I really liked old Pintrest better so I hope you could bring it back because Im kinda getting annoyed.

The current one really just looks like it was done by a bored 12yr old.

But that's just my idea, but I hope you could think on this!

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
column3: I like the app for keto low carb recipes only I thought this app was only for new recipes and Famous recipe not other products like women's underwear and party nudity.

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: While I love this app, I have one ongoing annoying issue: WHY is there not a mute function for the videos?? I don't want to turn them off completely, I just don't want to HEAR them. I want the ability to scroll through them and watch a few seconds and decide if it's something I want to actually hear. Most of the time it's some quirky music playing in the background and, let's be honest....I don't REALLY need to hear that in order to watch someone make paper roses. Right?

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
column3: Love Pinterest! It's my place to go for entertainment, education and relaxation!!

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: I LOVE looking at Pintrest for ideas and USED to love how well it helped kept ideas organized but more and more often now, you click on a Pin and it plays the WRONG video, or the amount of videos that simply WON'T play on the app and the number of times the thumbnail doesn't even match the content that is searched for and played, is making the app unusable. And no, this isn't the creators falsely advertising videos, it takes 2 to 3 times restarting app and same video will finally play correctly.

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
column3: I've used this app for years and it's consistency, ease of use and variety are the reasons I rely on Pinterest. I began using it to find ideas for drawing. I now use it for more advanced ideas for drawing as my skill is honed. Lately I've been intrigued by the endless recipes. To my delight, I see more ideas with the entire process being displayed in seconds vs the picture. I'm super stoked and I highly recommend this app.

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: Pinterest has gone downhill. Its appeal was that it wasn't sleazy like Facebook et al. Now it's just like all the others. We see a fraction of the content we choose, but 100% of the ads Pinterest wants us to see. I understand the need for ads. But it's gotten so pervasive that it's not worth it anymore. The last straw was the intrusive requirement for birthdays. I put a fake one in so that I could have access to retrieve pins I don't want to lose, and transfer them elsewhere. Buh bye....

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column3: Usually, I don't mind the updates and changes. Changes are supposed to be good. Then, the developers got rid of the explore option. Not a good move, but I got used to it and moved on. It actually made me use the app less, which had been good for my productivity. Now, however, I can't even browse through the homescreen pins without "Know somebody who'd like this idea?" taking up half the screen. Seriously, just let me see the pin so I can carry on not sharing them with the friends I don't have.

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: I have used and loved Pinterest for a long time - both for content and mindless scrolling. Since the update a while ago to the floating bar instead of a permanent bar to take you to your personal page and click to search I've had more difficulties. The bar disappears and is not consistently recalled when I scroll to the top or reverse my scrolling. Seems like a bug? Happily 5 stars when they figure out this fix.

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
column3: Ok, as a Pinterest user from 2015, I still love this app to this day. Although I don't like some things where if I save one pin or search something up, my for you changes, but it's not that big of a deal since it changes back fast. I love making boards and saving pins, and creating pins is easy as well. The buttons are easy to navigate and overall this is my favorite app paired with Spotify of course!

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
column3: I'd like to make a recommendation, the app fascinates me and is one of my favorites without a doubt but I think there is something that could help people who have slow devices or a slow or unstable Internet connection, besides saving data to those who use it using mobile data, it's simple: A new option to enable and disable the automatic playback of videos within the app and a very similar one that allows you to choose on what type of network you would like the automatic playback of videos. Thx

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: Don't like that they got rid of the "photo comment" feature or the "I tried this Pin!," feature. I get a lot of recipes off of pinterest, and now I can't see real pictures or examples of the recipe. To mitigate this, I downloaded a previous version of Pinterest. You can find the link to download the old pintetest on YouTube, forum boards, etc. Thank me later!

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: They constantly update this app to become more like Instagram/Snapchat. I don't want stories from pinteresters!!!! I don't want a shopping section!!! I just want my standard feed with the option to add suggested pins to my boards. It feels like recently all social media apps are merging into the same thing which makes them lose their individuality and using them nowhere near as desirable üòî not impressed!!

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: Haven't been able to search for individual boards to follow instead of pins in a very long time. Really miss this feature. I can search for accounts, and pins, but not boards. Will improve my review if this gets fixed. Edit: Why on Earth is there a black vignette on the top of every pin you select on mobile????? It ruins looking at art, or reference for art. You guys keep changing little things, and this app is getting worse. Edit: Everything saves to profile? Why?????? LET ME CHOOSE MY BOARD.

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column3: I enjoy finding things I have never see Like waterfall Garden tips

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: I have been uploading some spins and some of them showed that the comments were disabled which I don't remember I did. I tried to enable the comments but it's not working it says some error has occured and does not let me enable the comments. This is quite problematic for me becoause I want the review and it just doesn't let people comment. Please fix it asap.

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column3: So much to learn from and search. However, sometimes frustrating. When I search for certain things and click a particular item, I have to keep clicking to go deeper rather than just go directly to the recipe I picked. I do appreciate the extensive categories I can search from.

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: Pinterest was my favorite app for many years but with this new update it's just getting hard to use and it's not even a pleasing experience anymore... The idea was to save pins in their respective boards but the update won't let you save the pin in that desired board, it automatically saves it on your profile. This is tedious since you can't keep your pins organized and if you want to save them in a board you just gotta make extra steps than before... It's just very uncomfortable now.

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column3: Literally a really good app! I use it almost everyday! One issue is that when you want to transport photos on one board to another board, it adds the photo to the board but it leaves the other board. I don't know how to explain this but I'd like to ad multiple photos to multiple boards without the photo leaving the original board.

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: I used to save and download wallpapers from Pinterest. But, this app downloads a lower resolution image than the Pinterest website loaded in Chrome (both pc & android)! I agree, It's faster but quality can't be compromised! Moreover, downloading without app saves an appropriate file name but app saves it with a useless serial number type filename! I'll be back to the web again...no more Pinterest app! Will be back when these are fixed. Thanks!

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: you can search up almost anything you want. but the recommended images and videos can be VERY disturbing. animal abuse, gore, etc. theres a lot of problems with this app. bugs, glitches, and more. i once removed it from my homescreen, and when i put it back to my homescreen my user wasnt found and almost everything was black. super weird, please fix this too

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: I'm in the Google Play Store & it states "LAST UPDATED 7/6/20". I'm here bcuz the APP continuously locks up, goes black or says "Pinterest stopped working". I'll turn my phone off & on, uninstall the APP & then reinstall it. Some videos will say update/upgrade Pinterest so I click on that & it takes me here 2 the Play Store page 4 your APP but there are no options 2 update/upgrade & it shows the last update is 7/6/20. Your "get help" pages freeze & I can't send you a message. UGH!!!

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
column3: I was in a pretty big art block, I was having trouble finding good inspiration/references for drawings but all I did was search up "drawing references" and boom I found great references and I am out of that art block for now. I also look at memes on pintrest and they never fail to make me laugh. It does bother me that it stops working while trying to swipe through but it's okay because all it's other great features overpower it!

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
column3: Pinterest is one of the Most Empowering, Beautifully Creative Apps Bar None. It holds Worlds of Images, Articles- Whatever You can Envision there is a Plethora of Images to Bloom within the Pages You Create! Pinterest also Offers You the Option to Create Private Pages that only You can Peruse. Create a Private Journal and add to it as often as You Desire. Put Together Your Private Vision Board and enlarge Your Visionary Self! There's a Whole Community Within this App. Begin Dreaming Again!

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
column3: It has been fantastic experience, alot of interesting stuff most of which are so relevant to my liking. There is alot to learn and new ideals keep on poppoing as continues checking more information. The DIY part is also a great tool that teaches how to do simple things for ourselves without depending too much on the so called experts. Indeed some of the works does not require experts but to apply ourselves. Please keep-on updating up, we truly appreciate what we learn from this app.

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
column3: I used this app for a while now. It's perfect for me. The only trouble I have is that when I'm listening to music and browsing through pinterest, some pins can stop the music when I select them, even if they don't have audio. Please fix this so the experience could be more enjoyable. Other than that, I love the app.

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
column3: A really good app for finding things out and sharing information.

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: Won't lete sign in with FB or my password. It just sits on a blank screen.

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: I absolutely love this app, it's my favourite afterall. It's just that since a long time the messages option is not available, at first i jus thought it's a glitch but it just totally disappeared and I'm not able to talk to anyone on Pinterest anymore. Also when u click on someone's followers or your own it just shows no one's following u/ them yet . Tho it's clearly written 9/whatever number of followers. This all is jus so annoying and inconvenient. Please solve them asap thanks!

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: Hi, Pinterest. Please fix the problem in your app. I'm using Samsung S9+ and always unable to upload photo saved in SD card. When hit the plus button, the app is just showing the images from the internal storage. Unlike in Facebook and Instagram apps, images either from SD card or in internal storage are being shown. It is actually convenient.

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: First of all, there's no search function to find your Pinterest boards you want to pin something on, instead you have to scroll through all of your boards to try and find the right one. I have hundreds of Pinterest boards, this is very time consuming. I don't use the Pinterest app that often just for this reason. Instead, Pinterest is better used on my laptop. Still, that doesn't get rid of my next problem, there are more ads than Pins, enough that it's really taking the fun out of the app.

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: Most of the problems I have with this app have been fixed over time or are currently minor but the playing random music/ads/whatever it is when I pin something is annoying enough I'm considering deleting the app. I have auto play turned off, nothing should be playing. I also listen to podcasts most days with headphones in and whatever it is this app starts playing when I pin something is always way louder than necessary, sometimes even painfully if I was listening to something with higher volume.

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: I've been using this app for almost 3 years, and it's a great app. But since last one month the app isn't working at all! Everytime when I open this app, the homepage is always loading, but never refreshes. Instead it says "User not found". At first I thought it was my device's problem. But now I can't even open the app. Please fix whatever problem is going on with it as soon as possible.

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
column3: woww , really amazing app thanks alot Owner, but i have one problem, please üôè add one option in next update When I'm watching a video on Pinterest, if I like a video, I like it. I want it to go into the Likes folder so I can find it again, like Facebook has the option of video face. It is saved in the book and can be easily viewed again when you go

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column3: I love this app alot i have been using it for years but i would like to mention a few glitches and suggestions #1 sometimes clicking on a picture on the more like this page or on the homepage would play an ad or a video in the background that was next to the pin and sometimes music playing would pause clicking on a picture at random times. #2 i suggest adding a button that allows you to select mulitple to save pins from someone else's board or on the home page too. ‚ô°the app tho :)

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column3: This has been a very helpful link for work. Some of the image viewers are weird. When navigating a post and its frustrating when i find gold and then the site requires a membership to even see it. I know its not pintrests fault but can be frustrating. Overall i enjoy the app and it helps me organize my hobbies and personal development.

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column3: It's a great app for the creative and non creative alike! It has a vast ocean of knowledge for the experienced and those wanting to learn...from cooking to fashion to decor, crafts, inspiring quotes, tips on almost everything, and so much more! There is some room for improvement, but overall it's my go to place for ideas, inspiration and knowledge!

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: While I understand the aesthetic you guys were going for, the newest update is definitely NOT an improvement. Right now the biggest problems are the appearance and functionality. Finding and moving pins is tedious and the overall design is unpleasant and overwhelming. I appreciate the effort to make Pinterest a bit more cozy, so to help with that I suggest returning to the previous setup and adding themes that are much easier on the eyes, such as greys and pastels.

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: Every time I try to find a particular person's profile, it doesn't let me click on see more profiles under that name. It keeps me on explore or shop. It never used to do this before. Edited: Pinterest is cool for ideas and stuff but my app seems to be possessed. It has a mind of its own and opens up on its own without me pressing anything. I have the data set to be not running in the background, the battery is restricted and it's still opens up on its own

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
column3: I love Pinterest. Its my go to place for anything I need. It has pictures, cards & craft kits, recipes for, food, hair growth, dough for crafts, instructions for making almost everything imaginable. I got locked out by accident one time & I about went crazy without it. My favorite app out there. Thank you!

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
column3: I found a lot of crafts that I can make again all of my crafs were stolen from here you have the very best I rate you a 100% great

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: Hi I have been using Pinterest for a year now, and It was going smoothly, I liked it. But for the past 2 days, my pinterest is in working. It's not opening and always loading. So I tried deleting it, and then reinstalled. But after installing it I can't log in anymore. Whenever I try to give my email, it always says please try again. What should I do, please help.

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
column3: I love this site, it can be accessed on a pc or in the app. Great to find ideas for craft projects, crochet, knitting, macrame, painting, drawing,etc. which is mainly what I use it for but there is so much more, just type in what your searching for and you are sure to find free patterns, advice, yoga poses, recipes, DIY, inspirational quotes, the list is endless! I love pinterest, LOVE it. Honestly once you get into it and start saving stuff to your boards off you will be hooked! Happy pinning!

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: Too many ads. It's like every 4th block there is an ad in motion and takes away from what I was actually looking for. This has become annoying, kinda feel a bit of motion sickness and not wanting to be on the app as much as I used to. I try to cover it up with a paper but still see the ad moving. I get it it's an ad and it pays so people downloading the app is able to use it for free.

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
column3: Pinterest is acting weird, at least for me. Everytime I go in it freezes, I give it a few minutes but it doesn't work. I end up having to close the app multiple times and sometimes it just won't work. It didn't do this before, I love Pinterest. It has helped me on my art skills a lot and has good content. I hope this problem can be fixed.

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column3: I enjoy the app, but sometimes it lags. It sometimes take a long time to notify me if the picture had been downloaded. Can I also give a suggestion? Aside from the notification that pops up from above when you're about to duplicate saving a pin, why don't t you also add the feature where it gives you the option to automatically remove duplicates, that way it maight be easier for users to arrange their pins.

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: I've used this app for probably around 8 years. It's even more chalk full of ads lately. Newest update makes you add your birthday, can't get around it. Y'all don't need that so I can look for recipes and haircut ideas lmao. Especially if my Gmail is already attached, which also makes you add a birthday. App has just gone downhill over the years. Quality just isn't what it used to be. Searching for things doesn't even bring up what you're looking for half the time. Too riddled with Ads.

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
column3: This app has been a game changer for me. It allows me to think backwards. I punch in a word and this portal opens up for me and gives me perspective. For example, I have an excessive amount of pingpong balls!!!! I punch in pingpong ball crafts and boom, tons of ideas. I have too much of anything and boom, let's find something to do with it. I could go on and on. Not to mention the pinning for reference. I really love Pinterest!

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: every other pin is an ad. half the ads are videos, which all autoplay. the whole thing is so busy with popups of "buy! buy! buy!" your app disgusts me.

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column3: I really like Pinterest It has fast download speeds And pins for everything I need.

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column3: I really like Pinterest It has fast download speeds And pins for everything I need.

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: Used to love pinterest. Now every pin is a link to spam or something that isn't what it was supposed to be. The newer version is horrible compared to how easy previous versions were when searching. The "personalized" home page now consists of ads, items that were already pinned, and suggestions that remind me of fb's 'people you may know'.

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
column3: I find and get so many ideas from Pintetest from party ideas to styling my home! It helps me put together outfits and gives me ideas for different ways to style my nails when I go to the nail salon! This app is a gem to have!ü§óü•∞

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: I love pinterest itself but the ads are a nightmare. If you click on a pin that is not an ad but is situated near one on your screen, it will start the play the ad's music in the background. This is especially annoying because I often play music on my phone. About half of the time, the app will stop my music to play the music of an ad that I can't even see. The other half the ad's music is layered with my own and sounds absolutely awful. This situation is unavoidable when half of my feed is ads.

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars

I don't even know what to do with it anymore. I did not even search it. Also those tiktok videos also keep appearing. I don't even use tiktok. Please make it so that when we tune the feed you don't keep giving us the same photos.üòß In every 4 photos only one is related to my boards.üòí

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: I don't know why this app limits the amount of photos you can access in your albums when you attempt to upload something. Like if you have 100+ photos in an album for example, let's say it only let's you see 30 of those photos and pretends the others don't even exist? I either have to seperate the albums or delete photos off my device. It's tedious and annoying. Also opening the camera when I'm uploading is awful too

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
column3: Love, love the ideas from recipes to crafts to decorating. Great app!

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column3: I've been using pinterest for several years and it's very good. However I can't save images on my galery since yesterday. After I check my files management on my phone, I can find them but not in jpg. format, so I have to rename them and they can appear. Although the solution can be found, I hope this app still can be fixed so that the users don't need to do the renaming or other complicated stuffs and can get the practicality of this app again.

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column3: I love creating collections of both useful and fun things. I have recently started organizing my largest boards into sub-categories since it's not convenient to scroll for a long time looking for a particular pin with 1k pins in a board. I am enjoying it. However, it would be appreciated if the process of moving pins from a board to its sub-categories be easier and faster. At least on mobile I have to scroll past all of the sub-categories. Slow process even when moving max number of pins.

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: One off my favourite app but now a day's its not working. Please solved the problem as soon as possible.

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
column3: Everything is great on this site . Anything to everything Thank you to the administration for the great work that you do.

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
column3: Thoroughly enjoy looking at all the inspiring recipes.

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column3: First of all sometimes random adds appear, however that's Ok, this is because normally using Google or other platforms for images and references for art, hasn't really given me the art to improve however, pinterest has a variety of images from lots of topics and subjects, which makes me happy, because it's more fun to see a variety of pictures and photos to reference for drawing, illustrating and writing. So what I'm trying to say is that pinterest is good for a variety of users.

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column3: the most useful website to ever exist and it's extremely easy to maneuver! I recommend to everyone; it literally has something for everyone be it moms, diy fanatics or amateurs, gardening, cooking, construction you name it! one function has been annoying me and it's the fact that you can't search for something omitting something. For example: crock pot soups without cream. Will literally give me recipes with cream. There's no way to word it where you get the results you want.

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: Search results are amazing and this is why I use it regardless of all its huge flaws. It's a hustle to save pins most of the time the save to pins when hold is gone so you have to click the image and save it there. Even if it's not gone it still ruins the experience. Like can they please just add a gesture like triple tap/click to save pins fast? Next is when someone deleted the board you followed. You don't get informed about it and you lose trace. Organizing is hectic when saved on "Profile".

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: Look, I love pinterest. I think it's great. I've used it for years and it's very useful and enjoyable. But this new feature where everything gets saved to your profile is obnoxious. Why would I want to go back and sort through everything when I can just save it to the correct board right away? There should at least be an option to turn it off in the settings. Makes the experience a lot worse for me, which is sad since this is one of my favorite apps. :(

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
column3: I love this app ....it is a one stop shop, there is everything you could think of here be it food and recipes, home remedies, diy, hair and skin care, inspirational quotes and even celebrity updates, I would give it 10 stars if I could.

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: It's like pinterest gets worse with every update. Now the layout is weird and amateur looking. I've loved this app and have been using it for over 5 yrs but the videos and ads.... if they're gonna be plastered over everything give an option to mute the audio. it overpowers my music and interferes with other apps. I used to scroll on pinterest and have asmr playing in the back but now my ears get blasted by the loud ads and autoplay vids. Even when you turn off auto it still plays.

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: I love Pinterest, but I cannot continue to use the app if you guys don't get rid of the automatic "Save to Profile." At least make it like before, where you get to save your pins to specific boards, with added option of saving to profile. It's ruining the experience of the app because I have to take even more steps just to save something to my boards.

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: I have not used Pinterest for a while and today I discovered the app now has video advertising which ruins the experience. Every time you scroll down there is a new ad which is not only distracting when browsing but is extremely annoying. I appreciate that apps have advertisements but there are just too many for an app like this as it ruins tge enjoyment. Such a shame. Needless to say I will no longer use Pinterest.

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: Can you change the thumbnail of the boards when you save something to just one picture like it was before. It feels overwhelming and messy to look for the board I want to save the pin when every board has a collage of the 3 latest saved pins, furthermore I've already gotten used to the color/shape whatever of the pin I set as the thumbnail so this recent update doesn't help at all.

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
column3: Love all the different ideas and you can find anything you need, thank you

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: Pinterest I am so sick of the overwhelming amount of ads and promotional pins. I just want to scroll through normal pins without seeing two then having to scroll past 3 to 5 ads and repeat. This is the reason I barely use pinterest anymore and am genuinely considering deleting all together as it ruins the experience. Dissapointing.

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: One of the biggest complaints I have about Pinterest is when you save a picture it flashes a banner across the top of the picture telling you it's saved or giving you other options for similar ideas. It covers most of the picture and often I'm still looking at it after I've saved it. The saved banner used to show up at the bottom which was much less obnoxious. Now I have to swipe to get it off the screen.

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: This app used to be so good. I just received an ad for a dress 10 times consecutively, with the only difference being the company selling it (8 different ones). I scrolled for no joke- 1 minute and every 3 pins was reliably the same video but different companies. There were only one or two non-ad pins in between the advertisements. There are way too many ads now, and they aren't even vetted for authenticity.

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: Used to be 5 stars. I love it for creative projects, classroom ideas, and definitely recipes. But over the years the ads and nefarious pins (fake sites taking other pins and claiming to be their own) have taken over and it is hard to enjoy. There are so many videos on the feed, it is hard to just enjoy the beauty and hard work of the pins I want to see scattered in between.

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: I seriously LOVE this app! And it was really good for a while, but now I cant download ANY images anymore! I can pin them, but when I click on 'Download Image' it says 'Image Saved'or anything that way. But when I go to my gallery, it does not show up. I tried to re-install it but nothing happened. I don't know if it's just my phone, or pinterest. If you can, please try to fix this.

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: It used to be great, I had thousands of different pictures saved to different boards. But now anytime I refresh the home page nothing shows up but a white screen and anytime I try to look at my boards it sometimes says "you haven't saved any pins yet" and I have to refresh the app (this happens quite often). Also, many times when I try to pin something it'll say "board not found". I really hope this can be fixed since I really enjoyed using pinterest.

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column3: This is amazing app for adults but kids can't login by their own birth date . This app is not for kids

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: Too many recommendations & notifications sent. I like and enjoy the app when I have time, but it's a major time-suck. Even when I'm willing to give it my time and attention, I always waste far too much time with it - far more time than I had planned or wanted to. And far too often it just annoys me, cluttering up my email with multiple recommendations and notifications EVERY SINGLE DAY.

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: I've been using Pinterest for a really long time and I really enjoyed the app. Now it has alot of things that has to be fixed. First of the uppermost, whenever I search for something, a random prompt pops up saying "Oops, something went wrong! Please try again." even though my network connection is perfectly fine. Lastly, when I refresh my feed, the photo's turns into gray and doesn't show up anything. When I scroll down, the loading just takes forever. PLEASE DO YOUR THING AND FIX IT!!!

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: The new video format I've been seeing is HORRIBLE. Accessibility is destroyed. No rewinding recipe videos or anything of the sort, no restarting things to show my friend after I've watched it since they don't use the app, and no scrolling down to select what I watch next, forcing me onto whatever is next. So many functions are broken or uncomfortably awkward to use. At least give me the ability to turn off that method of scrolling. Not everyone likes mindlessly scrolling on TikTok.

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: The app started to act weird, it's always giving errors such as "sorry the pin couldn't be saved" or "sorry we couldn't save your profile" no matter what I do I always get these error messages, I can't upload pins especially videos because the quality is low and the audio is automatically being removed, I can't edit my profile or switch to a business account because it's giving me error messages once again, I used to like this app but the errors got so annoying I have to give it a 1 star rating

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: Format changed at some point. It drives my anti-spyware nuts, there for it won't let the website or app work. That tells me something about the safety. Deleted it a long time ago and some how it keeps reapearing on my phone. Now I can't get away from their adds either. I have deleted games and apps I really liked because they simply would not Stop showing Pintrest adds. Long story short. I used to like pintrest Years ago. Now I Don't and want it to stop being Shoved down my throat!

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: Still think that it is an amazing app, but there are some problems (bugs) I found. ‚Ä¢The "Add Photo" option for trying a pin is nowhere, but the "add comment" section keeps saying "add a photo and share how it went" I literally can't share how it went with this. ‚Ä¢It glitches. I get the "no violent comments" but after I cancel it, it just keeps saying "loading" then it exits then suddenly the loading pannel comes back and it just does this over & over and just crashes. Updating, hoping its fixed.

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: Love the concept, needs some work though. Hate the fact that whenever I click on a pin I need to go through the cookie settings. Some pins don't actually contain what the picture/headline advertises and there are way too many ads. I'd love an improved "more ideas" function for my boards. Pinterest are doing a good job of warning about spam though, and the overall concept rocks! It's particularly helpful for recipes and gardening ideas.

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: I'm disappointed to say that I don't like the newer updates. Removing the ability to swipe from pin to pin on the home section was (In my opinion) a bad move, it takes longer now and I'm so used to simply swiping to the next pin that I forget that the feature isn't available any more and it frustrates me beyond belief, especially since my computer doesn't have this feature either. All in all, I ask that you please, please, p l e a s e bring back the ability to swipe between pins. Please. :(

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars

Also really needs a "select multiple" function like in Google photos, where after holding one for a brief moment a circle shows over every photo and a single click on the photos will place a checkmark upon said circle, when several are selected you can then choose a board to add them all to.

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: I swear with each update sharing pins gets worse. Yesterday I was sharing a bunch of Pins with my best friend, or at least I though so, but nope because now when I share a pin I have to click on their picture and wait for it to send before I can send it again or exit out of sending to look at something else. column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars

Finally I quit, went to sleep, but I was able to use the password in the morning. It had apparently reset last night. It had reset. column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: Good ideea, bad implementation. Basic functionality, like tagging, searching or organizing boards, is missing. Once existing functionality, like search boards inexplicably removed. And returning from a post detail randomly performing a refresh, preventing checking other posts of interest, that have been replaced. Excessive commercials. And all of it seems intentional.

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
column3: Pinterest is a fun app to use. It's really great for finding new ideas. My favorite use for Pinterest is finding my new go-to cooking and baking recipes :)! It's convenient to find recipes via Google search, but it's a much more interesting, relaxing experience to visually explore the world of food with Pinterest. In addition to the seemingly endless treasure trove of food pics and videos, I love the fact that I can gather even more ideas from my favorite celebrity chefs & content creators.

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars

I've tried loging out and uninstalling it but nothing helps. I would love if this could be fixed.

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars

The Discover page isn't super consistent, but that may be an issue of saturation of the types of pins I want to see versus the types of pins that actually exist.

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars

Have fun

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars

Besides, mini tutorials for learning makeup tips and tricks force you to wander through the app.

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
column3: its definitely on the more time consuming side, but worth it. you can add notes about the item, the price, and name of the item! you can even add a picture of the item! you can also add link to the item if its online or just add.the stores name that the item comes from. theres a check box that you check off once you receive the item or purchase it. and you can share your list with other people by simply texting it to them. 10/10 would reccomend.

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: Pinterest staff needs to implement a system to differentiate AI art and actual art. I'm not making a case as to whether or not it belongs on the platform, it's just disingenuous to let it blend in with actual art that took skill to make as opposed to typing a few keywords into a generator.

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars

They have deactivated my account and the only way to get it reactivated is to share a copy of my birth certificate. Insane! App deleted!

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars

I decided to just download a lot of my pins and uninstall the app. I'm very disappointed.

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column3: Overall I love it and I use it all the time. The only two complaints I have is sometimes I pin something random that I usually would not have been interested in, and then my feed will blow up with similar pins because of the single one, it can be annoying. I want to see stuff that I pin regularly or things I've pinned regularly in the past. Second complaint is the organizing option for moving pins around to different folders is VERY time consuming. There has to be an easier way.

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: The app was great, was fun, I still miss the ability to see what other boards have pinned the same pin since that let me find boards easier but it's something I can deal with... Can this be fixed, undone, opted out of??

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: I've been using the app for a few years and since then, there are still MANY problems with the app, such as: I can't (in many cases) see users' response; I can't highlight any comments of my posts; It could have an option to delete messages; I can no longer use images in posts, etc. If you can solve such a problem, I will always be grateful.

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: First of all, the newest update sucks. Then, in the "home" section, they usually showed the pins that were 80% related to your pins and boards, but now they show about 40% related pins. I don't need to see DIY projects, i never even searched for it.

I don't want to have things pushed at me, I want to explore ideas and how to content, not be funneled to someone's Etsy account.

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
column3: I've used Pinterest for many years with no enjoyment. I would hunt for a cool wallpaper for my phone every time the old one bored me. They all bored me. Tonight I found myself there once again, but this time was different. My mind is blown, and thing is that the app hasn't changed. The effect AI has had on the art world is very obvious now. I hadn't realized how dull everything was before. I spent hours scrolling just for fun. It has made Pinterest the TikTok of dreams and it's inspiriting.

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: I used to LOVE this app, but the ads are WAY out of control! It drives me crazy the way we're bombarded with one app after another! I used to love to just leisurely scroll through and pin things that looked interesting or caught my eye. Not anymore!! You sold us out Pinterest! You reeled us in then got greedy and you haven't let up yet!! Once upon a time this was a FANTASTIC app! Now, not so much. Not even close!

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: Its ok has its flaws. I would love if you could navigate saved pins better, and I hate how it reloads a page if you leave it and click back again so you could be 50 scrolls deep and go back to the top losing the pins you were about to save. Also I dont care who saves my pins if I didn't make them please don't notify me every second, I also once got scammed by an ad shown on the app. Otherwise I am thankful for its existence and I spend many hours on it.

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: Used to be good, but right now it's unusable and annoying, whenever I open a pin it automatically starts a video-ad with audio turned on. since I usually use my phone to listen to music it interrupts the music so that I have to hit the play button again every time. No chance of using it comfortably that way. If at least the audio were off by default, the videos wouldn't be as intrusive as they are. Big thumbs down

People don't always have time to read through the pin when looking for ideas.

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars
column3: The algorithm isn't exactly brilliant at determining what I want to see (e.g. even after getting rid of numerous near-identical travel blog pins, I kept getting them again and again; also it took me clicking on about 3 German recipe pins to only see German recipes). In connection to that, I also find that it adapts "too quickly," e.g. when I need to find something and suddenly my other unrelated interests are entirely gone. Other than that, really big fan of the organisation of my own pins now!

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars

Pin a pic - tap on the board - tap a pic and swipe till' our eyes fall off. That's how we like it, and that's how your app will be loved.

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars

Your subject matter WILL be limited however, as this is intended to be a family-friendly app, and to that end you will experience a healthy dose of censorship. I would like to see a method to remove old pins I no longer want, or maybe an easier way of doing so if it exists.

column2: Rated 4 stars out of five stars
column3: Absolutely love Pinterest but I wish they'd bring back the topics like they used to have. I loved being able to see what was popular on Pinterest rather than just see my own feed and be able to look at categories if I didn't know what I wanted to search for. Now I find that when I search for certain things I find the same pins almost every time. I would really love it if the categories of the explore page would come back. My other issue is that the photo search function icon blocks a large amount of the pins when looking at them. If there is anything in that bottom right corner I struggle to see it because this function is in the way. Please please please can we bring back the categories and and move the icon for the photo search so posts can be seen easily. Otherwise I've loved Pinterest from day 1 and I really recommend

column2: Rated 5 stars out of five stars

Which to me is a little annoying because I'll see a pin i like and want to save but usually before i can tap it the page refreshes and its gone :\ but thats pretty much the only complaint. Would definately recommend!

Also I wish there were still board recommendations from other users. These are just things i noticed but it is a really good app in general.

Can't wait for an alternative program to pop up so I can bail.

column2: Rated 2 stars out of five stars
column3: Loved the app. HATE the ads. The app has 2 functions to view pins, scrolling down where you can see multiple pins at once. You can't go to the next or last pin. You have to go back to the verticle scroll screen to get out of it. Most of my online time is killing time on Pinterest & I'm seriously considering deleting it.

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
column3: Further changes made the last changes even WORSE. "quicksave" or "profile" boards that are completely unnecessary and forced upon users, requiring us to then move the pin to its appropriate board. The removal of "see all" boards option with "create new board" from a list of suggestions. I have to look at the suggestions before I can see my existing boards. This is awful. Additionally, the creation of a board for a shopping list was NOT something I ever wanted. Give me the option to remove it.

column2: Rated 1 stars out of five stars

Sucks that such an app downgraded like this, like such other apps.

Pinterest is definitely one of my favorite apps!

column2: Rated 3 stars out of five stars

But these are all small things that may not be a problem for most pinterest users. It's an overall good app for it's free price but it has tons of little things that make the experience worst.
